mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VOTE WHERE VT_STATUS = 'I' OR VT_STATUS ='E'

SELECT ROWNUM, X.* FROM(SELECT V.VT_NO ,V.VT_CREATE ,V.VT_END ,V.VT_DTDATE ,V.VT_UPDATE ,V.VT_STATUS ,V.VT_TITLE ,V.VT_CONTENT ,E.EMP_NAME AS EMP_NO ,V.EMP_NO AS NUM
FROM VOTE V
JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.EMP_NO = V.EMP_NO WHERE V.VT_STATUS = 'I' OR V.VT_STATUS = 'E' ORDER BY V.VT_NO )X ORDER BY VT_NO DESC

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOTE(VT_NO, VT_CREATE, VT_END, VT_TITLE, VT_CONTENT,EMP_NO) VALUES(SEQ_VOTE_VTNO.NEXTVAL, #{vtCreate}, #{vtEnd}, #{vtTitle},#{vtContent},#{empNo})
INSERT INTO VOTE_ATTACHMENTS (VTAT_NO, VTAT_CHANGE, VTAT_ORIGIN, VTAT_PATH, VT_NO) VALUES (SEQ_VOTE_ATTACHMENTS_VTATNO.NEXTVAL, #{vtatChange}, #{vtatOrigin}, #{vtatPath}, SEQ_VOTE_VTNO.CURRVAL)
INSERT INTO VOTE_CATEGORY(VTCG_NO, VT_NO, VTCG_NAME) VALUES(SEQ_VOTE_CATEGORY_VTCGNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_VOTE_VTNO.CURRVAL, #{vtct})
